long_description: The women's Patagonia Rover Hiking Shoes combine the best attributes of minimalist trail-running shoes with dual-zone sticky rubber soles for mobility in the mountains when your run goes vertical. Abrasion-resistant air mesh/synthetic leather uppers with toe rands balance protection and lightweight breathability; self-centering, stretch gusseted tongues keep debris out. Variable lacing system allows for a fully adjustable fit for improved footing/comfort when ascending and descending. Integrated 2mm footbeds with Dri-Lex(R) lining provide temperature and moisture control. Soft-flexing, 4mm-drop midsoles provide natural foot strike; 20% recycled dual-density EVA (heel is softer; ball harder); heel wedge provides increased cushioning. Patagonia Rover Hiking Shoes have 0.8mm-thick forefoot ESS plates to protect against rocks. Extra-sticky rubber outsoles provide essential grip on a variety of terrain; include climbing-focused toe areas for edging and traction-focused heels for loose surfaces.
short_description: The women's Patagonia Rover Hiking Shoes combine the best attributes of minimalist trail-running shoes with dual-zone sticky rubber soles for mobility in the mountains when your run goes vertical.
